snippet: The program, Got Your 6 -- military slang for "I've got your back" -- will involve all six major movie studios, the four big broadcast networks, Hollywood's largest talent agencies and a slew of cable channels.
abstract: The program, Got Your 6 -- military slang for "I've got your back" -- will involve all six major movie studios, the four big broadcast networks, Hollywood's largest talent agencies and a slew of cable channels.

headline.main: Hollywood to Back Effort to Aid Veterans' Return to Civilian Life
